title: Kanye West is STILL trending.  NBA Sports Talk, A Wedding and a Funeral, Closing Remarks and more.

description:
Kanye West STILL has social media turned upside down with his slavery comments. Uncle Steve and Fool #1 have NBA Talk that includes Draymond Green and Barkley. Tommy does the prank and Big Dog's Closing Remarks includes Kanye West and more!
